meanings.definition: Relating to or using signals or information represented by discrete values (digits) rather than by a continuous range of values.
meanings.sent1: The clock on the wall displayed a digital time, showing only numbers.
meanings.sent2: I prefer reading digital books on my tablet rather than physical copies.
meanings.sent3: The digital alarm clock refused to stop beeping, even after I hit snooze.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a digital computer, processing information quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The digital thermometer beeped loudly when it reached the set temperature.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to the use of computer technology.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to invest in digital marketing to reach more customers online.
meanings.sent2: My digital camera allows me to capture high-quality photos with ease.
meanings.sent3: The digital assistant on my phone always gives me sarcastic responses.
meanings.sent4: His brain seemed like a digital database, storing vast amounts of information effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The digital world is constantly evolving with new technologies and innovations.
